channel.title: 2 Problems Take a look
channel.description:
Hey, Thanks for looking here is my problem. i think i simple to fix.
Im useing the quest tabs as player infomation, with npc killed: amount, but then i kill an npc i need to relog before it gos from 9 to 10.
my other problem is how can i make random 50% change to teleport. like ::tele and 50% for i go to A and 50% before i go to B ?
